Mild Arabica Coffee Price, per month in cents/lb.
```{r}
library(tseries)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
coffee.ts <- read.csv("coffee.csv", header = TRUE)
head(coffee.ts)

coffee.ts <- coffee.ts%>%
  mutate(Date = as.Date(DATE, format = "%m/%d/%y"))%>% #Turn date from factor into Date type
  mutate(DATE = NULL)%>% #Drop factor date column
  mutate(price = PCOFFOTMUSDM/100)%>% #convert cents/lb to dollars/lb
  mutate(PCOFFOTMUSDM = NULL) #drop cents/lb column

head(coffee.ts)
```

```{r}
ggplot(coffee.ts,aes(x = Date, y = price))+
  geom_line()+
  ggtitle(coffee.ts$Date[max(coffee.ts$price)])
```

```{r}
plot(coffee.ts[2],coffee.ts[1])
```
